pkgpurl 0.0.9015
  • Reference

Function reference

High-level functions

process_pkg()
Process R Markdown package from source to installation
load_pkg()
Load R Markdown package
purl_rmd()
Purl Rmd/*.Rmd to R/*.gen.R
lint_rmd()
Lint R Markdown package
run_nopurl_rmd()
Run *.nopurl.Rmd files

Low-level functions

gen_pkgdown_ref()
Generate pkgdown reference index

Miscellaneous

pkg_config
pkgpurl package configuration metadata
